review: Have been consulting Dr Sudhir for my infant daughter. she was suffering from severe regurgitations. Doctor examined and gave her only probiotics for 3 days and she had so much relief.he does not give medicines unnecessarily. checks the root cause of the problem amd explains clearly.very calm and patient doctor.even the vaccinations he gave, there was no swelling for my daughter.would highly recommend this doctor!

review: Awesome is the word I can say. My son was in NICU for 1 month and continuing all follow up consultations till now with him. Very much satisfied by his approach of treating problems. No unnecessary medicines he prescribes and attends kids with calmness. For my kid he seems to be the best paediatric I have visited till now.
